textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here Everyone is so nice and welcoming. I enjoy attending this college. Am learning a lot I have enjoyed many of my classes. I am sure, however, that neither my Biology 101, nor my math, will stick with me. Login to rate or flag the reviews Jennifer 01/28/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 28 Categories Comments Great for these types of students John Tyler currently has two campuses, one in Chester and one in Midlothian. They both offer a full range of classes and disciplines. John Tyler is a great school for Liberal Arts and Sciences as well as vocational training. They offer everything from African drum lessons to fashion design to hands-on mechanics classes to nursing degrees to real estate. I love the variety and the people are very nice and friendly. I highly recommend checking out John Tyler. Tips
